FuncDef: This command is used to specify route policies that control how outbound routes transmitted to certain peers are handled. Route policies are configured in theconfig>router>policy-optionscontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the route policy name, up to 64 characters in length, or a policy logical expression, up to 255 characters in length.
Specifies the route policy name, up to 64 characters in length, or a policy logical expression, up to 255 characters in length.

msg: Error CLI:export <plcy-or-long-expr> [ plcy-or-expr [ plcy-or-expr ... (up to <14> max)] ]
